item.title: ‎How to Confirm Age in Umamusume Pretty Derby
item.description:
Cygames' Umamusume: Pretty Derby is all about training racers known as Umamusume, which basically means horse girls with big dreams. Your goal is to guide them through their careers, helping them debut in races, rise in fame, and eventually reach Legend class. Players can roll for their favorite ones using the Gacha and train them to climb the ranks.

That said, the game has a few confusing parts, one of them being the age confirmation screen that appears before you can jump into the server. This guide will explain the correct way to enter your age in Umamusume: Pretty Derby so you can hop in without any trouble.

‎How to Confirm Age in Umamusume Pretty Derby

When you first launch Umamusume: Pretty Derby on your PC, you’ll be asked to agree to the terms and select your country from a long list. Right after that, the game prompts you to confirm your age. The tricky part is that it uses a year-month format , which is quite common in many Chinese and Japanese games, and adding your birthdate the other way around can, of course, stop you from accessing the game's content. What makes it even more frustrating is the on-screen message telling you to type your month and year without any explanation, completely leaving you stuck on that window.

To confirm your age correctly in Umamusume Pretty Derby , you need to enter your birth year first , followed by the two-digit month . For example, if you were born in January 1990, you should type "199001" . Since January is the first month, it must be written as 01 right after the year. And if you were born in the 2000s, the format remains the same. For instance, if your date of birth is February 2002, you would add "200202" in the age confirmation box.

Make sure to enter your age using the Gregorian calendar. Other calendar systems likely won't be accepted. Also, don’t include any dashes or spaces between the year and month; just type them together as a six-digit number.

Once you lock in your age, there’s no way to change it later in the game, and since it directly affects your real-money purchase limits (like how many Carats or gems you can buy), it’s important to type it in as required. The good news is that minors can still play Umamusume Pretty Derby without any issues. However, as clearly stated by the devs, they’ll need permission from a legal guardian when making purchases with real currency.

item.title: Stardew Valley is in Good Company Among Steam’s Best Games of All Time
item.description:
Over 10 years after its release, Stardew Valley continues to make its mark in the industry by achieving yet another milestone. The critically and communally adored farming-sim has not only given a genre and subgenre new life, but it has also secured the top spot on Steam’s top 250 games list. Steam’s best games of all-time chart showcases a list of games that have received an overwhelming amount of player support and positive reviews, usually accompanied by critical acclaim and financial success. The feat is already quite impressive on its own, but the fact that it was accomplished by an indie title like Stardew Valley makes the milestone even more significant.

The beloved indie farming sim is experiencing a renaissance, driven by an influx of new Stardew players, as well as its recognition as one of the best indie titles of all time. Achieving the top spot in Steam’s top 250 solidifies Stardew Valley ’s recognition as more than just a popular idea—it establishes an official channel that cements its legacy in stone. Moreover, it grants ConcernedApe’s solo magnum opus the gravity it deserves in the face of other equally impressive games.

The Titles that Keep Stardew Valley Company on Steam’s Best Games of All Time List

Reaching the top of Steam’s best games of all-time chart is no small task. Having a community rally behind a title to grant it an overwhelmingly positive ranking demonstrates a developer’s commitment to providing a great player experience. This is achieved by honoring player feedback, implementing quality updates that enhance the game’s presentation, and presenting a product that is confident in the impact it is making on its genre. In this way, Stardew Valley is proudly joined by incredible company, such as:

Stardew Valley stands atop industry giants. From Game of the Year-winning Baldur's Gate 3 to the ultra-trending Deltarune , this beloved indie title not only holds its own but also exemplifies the power of creativity and community in gaming, proving that heartfelt design and player engagement can resonate just as deeply as high-budget productions.

Steam's Top 250 Is Populated by Indies, And That's A Great Fact

The presence of many indie darlings on Steam's list of the best games of all time highlights a significant shift in player loyalty and expectations. Titles like Stardew Valley showcase that gamers prioritize engaging and immersive experiences over the massive budgets typically associated with AAA games. This loyalty reflects a growing appreciation for innovative gameplay, storytelling, and artistic expression found in indie titles. Players are increasingly drawn to the unique charm and creativity these smaller studios bring to the table, proving that a compelling gaming experience isn't solely defined by graphics or marketing budgets, but by the passion and dedication of the developers behind the game.

You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home? It won’t be easy. Ever since Joja Corporation came to town, the old ways of life have all but disappeared. The community center, once the town’s most vibrant hub of activity, now lies in shambles. But the valley seems full of opportunity. With a little dedication, you might just be the one to restore Stardew Valley to greatness!

item.title: How to Increase Synergy Rank in Persona 5 Phantom X
item.description:
Synergy is equal to the level of friendship players have with every Companion Phantom Thief (and other NPCs) in Persona 5: The Phantom X . Players can unlock lots of rewards by increasing Synergy Ranks, and some of these include Wonder XP, and key items like Platinum Milicoins, Money, and consumables that will help players during their adventures.

This guide will help players understand how to increase Synergy Ranks fast in Persona 5: The Phantom X, with tips on how to earn more Synergy Points, and the best places to visit during meet-ups.

How To Increase Synergy Ranks in Persona 5 The Phantom X

To increase Synergy Ranks in Persona 5: The Phantom X players need to participate in social actions City Life events by spending Action Points, and meet up with the characters they want to increase their Synergy with. Players will need to pay attention to the City Life hub and check the activities they can participate in.

Players will also be able to gift certain items to characters during outings, increasing their Synergy Rank even higher. A good place to get more Gifts is by completing the Shinchi-Kun Quiz event, which rewards various Gifts if players answer all the questions right.

From time to time, some of the characters they meet will ask Wonder to hang out, and players should grab any chance to interact with them, so that they can increase their Synergy faster. Here's a list of every character players can increase their Synergy Ranks with:

  • Lufel - By participating in various Missions and following the Main Quest, unlocks Palace and Metaverse exploration buffs.
  • Merope - By participating in meet-ups and bringing her the requested Personas, she unlocks new Fuse recipes to create more Personas. Likes to visit bookstores and Japanese cultural spots. Answer questions to raise more Synergy ranks.
  • Yui - By Meeting in Harvest World Online (game in the players Home), unlocks more planters, and benefits related to cultivating plants. Likes plant related gifts, jewelry. Her meetups require Kindness levels.
  • Yaoling Li - By Meeting in the City and 'showing her around,' unlocks more Cooking Recipes. Likes food-related gifts, jewelry, and Shibuya souvenirs. Her meetups require Knowledge social skills.
  • Motoha - By completing her related quests, and meeting up in City Life. She enjoys sports-related activities and gifts. Her meet-ups require Proficiency levels.
  • Tomoko - By completing her related sub-quests and meeting up in City Life. She enjoys quiet places, and requires players to have a high Kindness value to make her a Soulmate.
  • Kayo - By completing her related sub-quest. Encounters with this older lady require high levels of Charm social skill. She enjoys gifts with flowers.

Each time players increase a Synergy Rank with these characters, they will unlock loads of rewards like Money, Crystals, Weapon Materials, Persona Materials, and more. Ranks go from 1 to 20, and unlock special perks at ranks 5, 15, and 20.

If players Prioritize a Bond, the chances of going on an outing with the 'acomplices' will increase exponentially. But beware, not all characters prefer the same hour to hang out. Motoha and Tomoko will prefer to hang out after school , while Merope, Yaoling Li, and Kayo, will only meet in the Evening . Finally, you can play online with Yui at night.

How To Reach Soulmate Rank With A Companion

By increasing Synergy ranks with certain characters in Persona 5: The Phantom X , you can unlock a special kind of relationship with them. Merope will automatically become your ' exclusive Concierge ' by reaching Synergy Rank 17 with her, and that's that; players cannot romance her. Other characters like Yui and Lufel are friendship locked , which means they cannot become something more than friends with them. Still, unlocking the Best Friends status will reward players with special emojis, frames and Avatars .

Players can romance Motoha, Tomoko, or Yaoling Li, but they cannot romance all three at the same time (sorry, no Harem Route here), by increasing their level to Soulmate (Lvl. 15). Players can only pick one Soulmate option , and one Best Friend option,

Be careful, though, once players have chosen a Soulmate and a Best Friend, they cannot regret their choice. So they should choose carefully and prioritize the character that fits them the best.

item.title: Crimson Desert Will Be Playable at an Upcoming Event
item.description:
Crimson Desert will feature a brand-new playable demo at Gamescom 2025, giving all attendees a chance to try out the highly anticipated open-world action-adventure game first-hand. Developed by Pearl Abyss, Crimson Desert has made waves thanks to its fighting-game-esque approach to combat, gorgeous visuals, and a single-player focus that helps it stand apart from the studio’s previous game, Black Desert Online . Where BDO was an ambitious attempt at an MMORPG, Crimson Desert is exclusively single-player, something that has only helped the game gain more traction among fans looking for a true AAA medieval ARPG.

Pearl Abyss has been gradually lifting the curtain on Crimson Desert with boss fight gameplay videos, extended looks, teaser trailers, and occasional demos. The hype surrounding Crimson Desert has been steadily growing as the game’s late 2025 release date approaches. A playable demo for the game was also made available at Summer Game Fest 2025 just a few weeks ago, but it was limited to certain pre-approved individuals. Gamescom will mark the first time a Crimson Desert demo has been made available to the wider public.

Pearl Abyss announced that Crimson Desert ’s next demo will be held at Gamescom 2025 at the Koelnmesse Exhibition Center in Cologne, Germany, from Wednesday to Sunday, August 20-24. Both media personnel and public attendees are welcome to experience the demo in the Entertainment Hall in Hall 06.1 | Stand B041 - A040. According to Lybee Park, CEO of Pearl Abyss Europe, the team is excited to let fans venture into the Crimson Desert ’s continent of Pywel directly to get “hands-on with the experience we’ve crafted.”

Crimson Desert Public Demo Coming to Gamescom 2025

The booth will include themed decor modeled after the game world and will be playable on AMD-powered PC hardware and Samsung’s Odyssey G6/G8 gaming monitors. Though there is no word on maximum capacity yet, the event runs for five full days, making it likely that most fans will probably get a chance to play. Pearl Abyss has also announced that those who do try out Crimson Desert ’s demo will also receive exclusive event merchandise as a thank-you for participating.

Early hands-on impressions of Crimson Desert from reviewers have been generally positive, but input from the general public matters more when getting players excited about the game. Gamescom 2025 marks a pivotal moment in the pre-launch cycle as it could solidify public perception surrounding the game and give it a greater air of legitimacy. Despite marketing efforts to ensure otherwise, Crimson Desert still appears too good to be true, and while previous demos and extended gameplay trailers have alleviated some concerns, a public demo will go a long way toward convincing fans that the game isn’t just a collective fever dream but something real.

item.title: Destiny 2: Xur Exotic Armor, Weapon, and Recommendations for June 27
item.description:
Xur has returned again to Destiny 2 , complete with new exotic and legendary gear for players to check out for a limited time. This week brought a number of new revelations for the upcoming Edge of Fate expansion and with only a few weeks left until launch, fans should likely expect plenty more. Bungie recently reveal upcoming exotic armor changes coming to Destiny 2 Edge of Fate, though this week also showed off some brand new features as well.

After teasing new destination powers in the Edge of Fate reveal, Bungie finally detailed the new abilities in full. Known as Dark Matter abilities in Destiny 2 , players exploring Kepler will be able to use all 3 in both combat and exploration. Mattrerspark turns players into a destructive arc ball, great for exploring small spaces or taking out groups of enemies. Mattermorph can suspend enemies as well as set up new paths, while Relocator offering ways to quickly zip through a zone.

With the weekend now here, the exotic merchant Xur has returned with a new inventory of gear for Destiny 2 players. Follow this guide for his current weekend location, news on his exotic cipher quest, as well as a review of all the exotic and legendary gear he's brought for the weekend of June 27, 2025.

Where is Xur?

Xur has taken up permanent residence in the Bazaar area inside The Tower, so there's no more hunting needed when the weekend comes around.

Since the Bazaar is located between both fast travel points, players can pick either one to load into. Head into the area where Ikora and Hawthorne are hanging out and look for the Ramen Shop towards the back wall. While facing the shop, the alley hiding Xur is to the right.

Destiny 2 Exotic Class Armor

Xur's role has continued to expand and evolve over the years. Alongside The Final Shape expansion, Xur's inventory in Destiny 2 expanded even more, moving back to Strange Coins as the currency of choice and featuring rank rewards, resources, and, of course, armor and weapons.

Starfire Protocol - Warlock chest armor

Exotic Perks :

  • Fusion Harness - Fusion Grenades have an additional charge and recharge from empowered weapon damage, with empowered weapon final blows granting more energy. Defeating targets with Fusion Grenades grant Rift energy.

While Starfire isn't considered a top-tier Warlock exotic, this one may be worth picking up in anticipation of the Edge of Fate. It was included in a list of exotics that will have same benefits as New Gear at launch, so for those who don't have it, this may be worthy of stashing to see what changes.

Stat Values (65 Total):

  • Mobility +2
  • Resilience +3
  • Recovery +30
  • Discipline +14
  • Intellect +8
  • Strength +8

Orpheus Rig - Hunter leg armor

Exotic Perk :

  • Uncanny Arrows - Provides ability energy for each target tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has an additional shot.

An excellent exotic for Voidwalker Hunters, so definitely worth a pickup for those who don't have one. For everyone else, the roll is okay, so it's not a must-have.

Stat Values (65 Total):

  • Mobility +4
  • Resilience +10
  • Recovery +20
  • Discipline +2
  • Intellect +13
  • Strength +16

Armamentarium - Titan chest armor

Exotic Perk :

  • And Another Thing - Gain an additional grenade charge. Grenade final blows spawn an Orb of Power.

Normally, this would be an easy pass, but since stats are changing when Edge of Fate launches, players will need to look at these a little bit differently. With such a high roll this week, it may be picking this up and stashing it to see how effective it might be when the expansion arrives.

Stat Values (69 total):

  • Mobility +16
  • Resilience +9
  • Recovery +11
  • Discipline +29
  • Intellect +2
  • Strength +2

Xur Inventory Items

Year 7 in Destiny 2 has upgraded Xur's inventory, adding a true rank progression system, rewards, as well as focusing options. Xur also has more than just weapons and armor as well, including:

  • Crimson Catalyst
  • Leviathan's Breath Catalyst
  • The Xurfboard (Skimmer Board Vehicle)
  • Essentialism/Stoicism/Solipsism OR Exotic Cipher
  • Exotic Engram
  • Enhancement Prism
  • Glimmer
  • Enhancement Core
  • Crucible Engram
  • Strange Gift (Random Item for 1 Strange Coin)

Xur's Exotic Weapons

Year 7's Xur revamp has also added the ability to offer multiple exotic weapons in one visit. Here is what Xur has this weekend:

Hawkmoon - Hand Cannon

  • Paracausal Shot - Final blows and precision hits with Hawkmoon grant stacks of Paracausal Charge. The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage based on the number of stacks. Stowing Hawkmoon on the final round removes this bonus.
  • Polygonal Rifling
  • Alloy Magazine
  • Surplus
  • Heavy Grip

Cerberus+1 - Auto Rifle

  • Four-Headed Dog - Shoots erratic bullets from all gun barrels at the same time.
  • Spread Shot Package - Aiming this weapon reduces the spread of its projectiles.
  • Rifled Barrel
  • Fluted Barrel
  • Full Bore

Fighting Lion - Grenade Launcher

  • Delayed Gratification - Grenade projectiles will bounce off surfaces. Holding fire and then releasing will detonate.
  • Thin The Herd - Direct hits do increased damage to combatant shields and cause a volatile detonation. Dealing damage increases reload speed. Rapid final blows against grenade-damaged combatants refill the magazine.
  • Hammer-Forged Rifling
  • Accurized Rounds
  • Fitted Stock

The Prospector - Grenade Launcher

  • Excavation - Grenades spawn cluster bombs upon detonation. Defeating targets creates Arc explosions.
  • Full Auto Trigger System - Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.
  • Volatile Launch
  • Augmented Drum
  • Hand-Laid Stock

Xur's Destiny 2 Legendary Armor and Weapons

Xur's Set of Legendary Armor and Weapons. All gear costs 50 Legendary Shards and 1000 Glimmer.

  • Extraodinary Rendition (Kinetic SMG)
  • A Distant Pull (Kinetic Sniper Rifle)
  • Chrysura Melo (Energy Auto Rifle)
  • Widow's Bite (Energy Sniper Rifle)
  • Just In Time (Heavy Sword)
  • Corsair's Wrath (Heavy Linear Fusion Rifle)
  • Crown-Splitter/Quickfang/Eternity's Edge (Heavy Sword)
  • Strange Weapon Engram
  • Anti-Extinction/Stella Incognita Armor Set
